issue.title: [C++] Consolidate array container and builder code, remove arrow/types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-418](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-418). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the interest of simplifying the public API, I'd like to put all of the Array subclass definitions in `arrow/array.h` and all the Builder definitions in `arrow/builder.h`
